song_lyrics: Vā’lo ghoḍalā khelāve Ghanshyām re, bāī māre āngaṇīe;
Māru chittaḍu chore chhe sukhḍhām re, ānkhalḍīnī aṇīe...
Ghoḍlā fere ne vā’lo muj sāmu here,
Hāre mune nyāl kīdhī āṇe fere re... bāī 1
Chapaḷ turang ati vege fare chhe,
Hāre e to garuḍno garv hare chhe re... bāī 2
Sur nar muni jan nīrakhe chhe prīte,
Hā re jāṇe chītra ālekhyā chhe bhīnte re... bāī 3
Rūḍo lāge chhe khabhe farke chhe paṭko,
Hāre rījhyo Premānand joī laṭko re... bāī 4
title: Vā’lo ghoḍalā khelāve Ghanshyām re

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-764: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Leelana Pad
